item.title: VPS - GRA2 - host652164
item.description:
Jan 4, 14:01 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 4, 13:55 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected switches

gra-z1c6-a70

Affected racks

G133A04

Affected hosts

host652164

Affected instances

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
any inconvenience caused while we resolve this issue.

item.title: [Worldwide][Dedicated Servers] - Licenses
item.description:
Jan 4, 13:48 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/01/2023 17:30 UTC
End Time : 04/01/2023 10:55 UTC
Root cause : The problem is due to an update of the catalog.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 4, 09:58 UTC
Identified - Update : The team has identified the root cause, it proceeds to fix the problem.

Jan 4, 09:51 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams are still investigating, we are sorry for the inconvenience.

Jan 3, 17:57 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 03/01/2023 17:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers may not be able to order a dedicated server with a plesk license.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigatingon the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
